mapper.select: SELECT m1.memberId, m1.userId, password, name, nickname, email, userLevel FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberId = m2.memberId WHERE m1.userId = #{userId} AND password = #{password}
SELECT ( SELECT r FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(100000, 999999)) AS r FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 1000 MINUS SELECT memberId FROM member1 ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) AS randomId FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member1(memberId, userId, password, userLevel, regDate, regUpdate) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{userId}, #{password}, 1, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO member2(memberId, name, nickname, birth, tel, zip, addr1, addr2, email) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{name}, #{nickname}, TO_DATE(#{birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{tel}, #{zip}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT m1.memberId, userId, password, userLevel, TO_CHAR(regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, TO_CHAR(regUpdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regUpdate, name, nickname, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, tel, zip, addr1, addr2, email FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberId = m2.memberId WHERE m1.userId = #{userId}

SELECT m1.memberId, userId, password, userLevel, TO_CHAR(regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, TO_CHAR(regUpdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regUpdate, name, nickname, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, tel, zip, addr1, addr2, email FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberId = m2.memberId WHERE m2.nickname = #{nickname}
